page.title: 11Traditional games (4)
page.content:
{Skipping.}People can skip on their own or with a partner.Many children sing rhymes whilst skipping.Here is an example.
{I'm a little bumper car, {Number seventy three. {Zomming round the c_o_r_n_e_r {At ninety miles an hour. {Stop by the garage {Get repaired and fill me up. {I'm a little bumper car {Zooming round the c_o_r_n_e_r. { { {Forty Forty.}One person counts to 100 while the others hide.After 100 the counter mmust seek out the other players.While he is searching the others must run back to the starting point to save themselves. If one is caught they become the seeker.
